dict.acceptation: 反对，抗争；使相对；使对照；抵制；

sent.orig: Chinese people oppose war, the people of the world against war, the Olympic oppose war!
sent.trans: 中国人民反对战争，世界人民反对战争，奥林匹克反对战争！

sent.orig: It is not enough to wait patiently until enough people oppose slavery to outlaw it.
sent.trans: 耐心等待，直到有足够多的人反对奴隶制，最终在法律上取缔它，这样做是不够的。

sent.orig: Appoint an evil man to oppose him; let an accuser stand at his right hand.
sent.trans: 6愿你派一个恶人辖制他，派一个对头站在他右边。

sent.orig: Most of them oppose the Communist Party under compulsion.
sent.trans: 他们的反共，大多数是被迫的。

sent.orig: This is our internationalism, the internationalism with which we oppose both narrow nationalism and narrow patriotism.
sent.trans: 这就是我们的国际主义，这就是我们用以反对狭隘民族主义和狭隘爱国主义的国际主义。
